SELECT a.id, a.name, a.in_charge, a.dept, a.call_num, a.phone, a.email, a.business_num, a.addr, a.last_transaction, a.first_contract_date, a.memo, a.star, ch.name AS channelName, s.name AS segmentName FROM customer a LEFT JOIN channel ch ON c.channel_id = ch.id LEFT JOIN segment s ON c.segment_id = s.id
AND c.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
AND c.email LIKE CONCAT('%', #{email}, '%')
ORDER BY c.id DESC

SELECT c.id, c.name, c.in_charge, c.dept, c.call_num, c.phone, c.email, c.business_num, c.addr, c.last_transaction, c.first_contract_date, c.memo, c.star, ch.name AS channelName, s.name AS segmentName FROM customer c LEFT JOIN channel ch ON c.channel_id = ch.id LEFT JOIN segment s ON c.segment_id = s.id WHERE c.id = #{id}
